definition: Sir Donald Tsang or Tsang Yam-Kuen (1944-)

sentences.english: Hong Kong's chief executive, Donald Tsang, condemned the acts as 'cold-blooded and malicious.
sentences.chinese: 香港行政长官曾荫权谴责镪水袭击行为“冷血恶毒”。

sentences.english: On behalf of the Special Administrative Region government and Hong Kong people, he offered condolences to her family.
sentences.chinese: 曾荫权还代表特区政府和人民向肥肥的家人表示慰问。

sentences.english: Joining the election would at least prevent Chief Secretary Donald Tsang Yam-kuen, the frontrunner, being returned unopposed.
sentences.chinese: 参选至少可以阻止大热门政务司司长曾荫权自动当选。

sentences.english: Suspicion towards Mr Tsang remains strong in business and political quarters, particularly in the pro-Beijing camp.
sentences.chinese: 政商界对曾荫权并不信任，尤其是左派。

sentences.english: Kande had got in touch with the staff to cater their special needs.
sentences.chinese: 酒店曾多次和工作人员接触，了解曾荫权一行的需求。

sentences.english: Donald Tsang, HKSAR's chief executive, forwent his car this morning and walked to work.
sentences.chinese: 香港特首曾荫权今天早上带头弃车步行上班。

sentences.english: Chief Executive Donald Tsang meets FEHD directors.
sentences.chinese: 行政长官曾荫权会见本署署长级官员。

sentences.english: Both Mr Tsang and Mr Tang are tipped as forerunners in the race for the next chief executive.
sentences.chinese: 曾荫权和唐英年都被视为下届特首的热门人选。

sentences.english: Why, at this moment, has the central government accepted the resignation of Mr Tung Chee-hwa? What are your expectations of the Acting Chief Executive Mr Donald Tsang?
sentences.chinese: 你对代理特首曾荫权有什么期望？

sentences.english: Mr. Tsang acknowledged the problem on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 曾荫权在上周五承认了这个问题。
